name: Crossword for Kids | Construct 3
description:
Shepherd Games offers you a simple educational game, Crossword for Kids.

Easy to customize and implement as detailed in the videos below. 

Features 

  • One source code to support multiple platforms
    • Android
    • iOS
    • Windows Phone
    • Windows Desktop
    • Mac
    • Linux
    • Facebook Instant Games
    • HTML
  • Made in Construct 3
  • No coding knowledge required
  • Try the demo before you download it
  • Easy to implement

Download folder contains

  • Construct 3 Source file (C3P)
  • HTML Game
  • Documentation

For any support or queries, you may reach out to us at our Discord channel or write to contact@shepherd.games

If you don't want to purchase the Construct 3 subscription or have trouble with installation and customization, don't worry we will help you for a very low price.

Support us on PayPal | Patreon | BuyMeACoffee

Download Source Codes | Premium Assets 

Images from freepik.com 

Audio from bensound.com and zapslapt.com

Consider supporting my work, helps me to develop more assets and games for you
